channel.title: Abouts on CoreUI
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on CoreUI

item.title: Cookie Policy
item.description: Cookie Policy This Cookie Policy takes effect on May 25, 2018. Information about our use of Cookies and similar technologies We want to make sure you understand how cookies and other similar technologies are used by creativeLabs on our websites (https://coreui.io) and (https://genesisui.com).These technologies have several purposes. Our website uses cookies and similar technologies to distinguish you from other users of our website. This helps usto provide you with a good experience when you browse our website and also allows us to improve our Site.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: Privacy Policy This Privacy Policy was published on May 24, 2018 and will take effect on May 25, 2018. creativeLabs (“we” or “us”) knows that you care how information about you is used and shared. This Privacy Policy explains what information of yours will be collected by creativeLabs when you use the our websites (https://coreui.io/ and https://genesisui.com/), how the information will be used, and how you can control the collection, correction and/or deletion of information.

item.title: Sponsors & Backers
item.description: Support CoreUI core’s development through crowdfunding. CoreUI Team creates and actively maintains the following MIT licensed open-source projects that are completely free to use: CoreUI - UI Components Library CoreUI - UI Components Library for Angular CoreUI - UI Components Library for React CoreUI - UI Components Library for Vue CoreUI Angular Admin Template CoreUI Bootstrap Admin Template CoreUI React Admin Template CoreUI Vue Admin Template We’re aware that thousands of developers use our products, so our team is 100% focused on CoreUI product development.
